summary:
Elon Musk’s Tesla Supercharging Station Which Will Accept Dogecoin Payments Set To Open – Details - Elon Musk's Tesla Supercharging Station, which will accept Dogecoin payments, is set to open soon. The details of the opening are not provided in the passage.

 XRP Takes A Hit As It’s Dropped From Hong Kong’s Top 5 Crypto Index - XRP has been dropped from Hong Kong's top 5 crypto index. The reason for the drop is not provided in the passage.
